data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Name one thing people do that you think is a waste of time. Why do you think people do this anyway?
data.answer: When it comes to one thing that I think is a waste of time is scrolling through social media on smartphones. The first and foremost reason for that is it can easily steal away all my valuable time when I am trying to work on something more important, such as an assignment or a job. No surprise here. And it's easy to understand why people are spending hours scrolling through social media on their phones – the social media applications on smartphones people are using nowadays are just remarkable. They allow people to do a great number of things. For instance, I am bombarded throughout the day with social media notifications – my posts got commented on, I got tagged by someone, updates on my friends’ activities, etc. Because of these social media applications, I have become so addicted to my phone that I cannot help but to check it every now and then. It has, without a doubt, become an indispensable part of me. However, scrolling through social media is such a bad habit that I need to break.
